named-query.name: Restaurant.searchByName
named-query.query: FROM Restaurant r WHERE r.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :name, '%')

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsResponsible
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM Restaurant r JOIN r.responsible u WHERE r.id = :restaurantId AND u.id = :userId

named-query.name: Order.isOrderManagedBy
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM Order o JOIN o.restaurant r JOIN r.responsible u WHERE o.code = :orderCode AND u.id = :userId
